code: import React from"react";import Kilometers from"./Kilometers";import Miles from"./Miles";import Buttons from"./Buttons";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Km2Mile(){const[distance,setDistance]=React.useState(0);const[flipped,setFlipped]=React.useState(false);const onChange=event=>setDistance(event.target.value);const onReset=()=>setDistance(0);const onFlip=()=>{onReset();setFlipped(flipped=>!flipped);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Kilometers to Miles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Kilometers,{flipped:flipped,onChange:onChange,distance:distance}),flipped?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["You want to convert from ",distance," miles to kilometers."]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["You want to convert from ",distance," kilometers to miles."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Miles,{flipped:flipped,onChange:onChange,distance:distance}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Buttons,{onReset:onReset,onFlip:onFlip})]});}export default Km2Mile;
